name: Frick It, We Fall
description:
Frick It, We Fall is an arcade game where you descend into a pit as far as you can while killing as many monsters as possible.

Controls:

- Movement

     -> A + D / Left + Right / Gamepad Cross Left + Right / Gamepad Left

     -> Double tapping any of the above will allow you to dash

- Attacking

     -> Space / Left Mouse Button / Gamepad A Button / Gamepad Trigger

This game was made for the utGDDC 2022 Fall Jam. The theme of the jam was "The Fall."

Music by Ben Beardall
